attributes.action: family law - review of the system. A review is urgently needed. Section 7 reports are finding alarming numbers of children who are exposed to abuse
attributes.additional_details: This petition aims to protect children from conflicting recommendations which may expose them to further harm. In a nutshell if a section7 report supports the allegation of abuse then the recommendation must be consistent with that finding. Appropriate prosecution of the perpetrator should immediately take place, we can't allow children and the parent who is protecting them to go through the devastation that this causes in vain.
